ISSUE.TITLE: Adding Power (ppc64le) support to Drone Server
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It looks like we do not have ppc64le support for the drone server. I am working on adding ppc64le support to it. If you don't have ppc64le resource for test this pipeline, then we can provide that resource as well.
